verses.arabic: صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ
verses.translation: Sad: By the Qur'an, Full of Admonition: (This is the Truth).
verses.transliteration: Sad walqur-ani theeaththikr

verses.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
verses.translation: But the Unbelievers (are steeped) in self-glory and Separatism.
verses.transliteration: Bali allatheena kafaroo fee AAizzatinwashiqaq

verses.arabic: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
verses.translation: How many generations before them did We destroy? In the end they cried (for mercy)- when there was no longer time for being saved!
verses.transliteration: Kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarninfanadaw walata heena manas

verses.arabic: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
verses.translation: So they wonder that a Warner has come to them from among themselves! and the Unbelievers say, "This is a sorcerer telling lies!
verses.transliteration: WaAAajiboo an jaahum munthirunminhum waqala alkafiroona hatha sahirunkaththab

verses.arabic: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ
verses.translation: "Has he made the gods (all) into one Allah? Truly this is a wonderful thing!"
verses.transliteration: AjaAAala al-alihata ilahan wahidaninna hatha lashay-on AAujab

verses.arabic: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ يُرَادُ
verses.translation: And the leader among them go away (impatiently), (saying), "Walk ye away, and remain constant to your gods! For this is truly a thing designed (against you)!
verses.transliteration: Wantalaqa almalao minhum aniimshoo wasbiroo AAala alihatikuminna hatha lashay-on yurad

verses.arabic: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ
verses.translation: "We never heard (the like) of this among the people of these latter days: this is nothing but a made-up tale!"
verses.transliteration: Ma samiAAna bihatha feealmillati al-akhirati in hatha illa ikhtilaq

verses.arabic: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ
verses.translation: "What! has the Message been sent to him - (Of all persons) among us?"... but they are in doubt concerning My (Own) Message! Nay, they have not yet tasted My Punishment!
verses.transliteration: Aonzila AAalayhi aththikru minbaynina bal hum fee shakkin min thikree bal lammayathooqoo AAathab

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
verses.translation: Or have they the treasures of the mercy of thy Lord,- the Exalted in Power, the Grantor of Bounties without measure?
verses.transliteration: Am AAindahum khaza-inu rahmatirabbika alAAazeezi alwahhab

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ
verses.translation: Or have they the dominion of the heavens and the earth and all between? If so, let them mount up with the ropes and means (to reach that end)!
verses.transliteration: Am lahum mulku assamawatiwal-ardi wama baynahuma falyartaqoofee al-asbab

verses.arabic: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
verses.translation: But there - will be put to flight even a host of confederates.
verses.transliteration: Jundun ma hunalika mahzoomunmina al-ahzab

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: Before them (were many who) rejected messengers,- the people of Noah, and 'Ad, and Pharaoh, the Lord of Stakes,
verses.transliteration: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohinwaAAadun wafirAAawnu thoo al-awtad

verses.arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ
verses.translation: And Thamud, and the people of Lut, and the Companions of the Wood; - such were the Confederates.
verses.transliteration: Wathamoodu waqawmu lootin waas-habual-aykati ola-ika al-ahzab

verses.arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
verses.translation: Not one (of them) but rejected the messengers, but My punishment came justly and inevitably (on them).
verses.transliteration: In kullun illa kaththaba arrusulafahaqqa AAiqab

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
verses.translation: These (today) only wait for a single mighty Blast, which (when it comes) will brook no delay.
verses.transliteration: Wama yanthuru haola-iilla sayhatan wahidatan ma lahamin fawaq

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: They say: "Our Lord! hasten to us our sentence (even) before the Day of Account!"
verses.transliteration: Waqaloo rabbana AAajjil lanaqittana qabla yawmi alhisab

verses.arabic: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: Have patience at what they say, and remember our servant David, the man of strength: for he ever turned (to Allah).
verses.transliteration: Isbir AAala mayaqooloona wathkur AAabdana dawooda thaal-aydi innahu awwab

verses.arabic: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ
verses.translation: It was We that made the hills declare, in unison with him, Our Praises, at eventide and at break of day,
verses.transliteration: Inna sakhkharna aljibalamaAAahu yusabbihna bilAAashiyyi wal-ishraq

verses.arabic: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And the birds gathered (in assemblies): all with him did turn (to Allah).
verses.transliteration: Wattayra mahshooratankullun lahu awwab

verses.arabic: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and sound judgment in speech and decision.
verses.transliteration: Washadadna mulkahu waataynahualhikmata wafasla alkhitab

verses.arabic: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ
verses.translation: Has the Story of the Disputants reached thee? Behold, they climbed over the wall of the private chamber;
verses.transliteration: Wahal ataka nabao alkhasmi ithtasawwaroo almihrab

verses.arabic: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ
verses.translation: When they entered the presence of David, and he was terrified of them, they said: "Fear not: we are two disputants, one of whom has wronged the other: Decide now between us with truth, and treat us not with injustice, but guide us to the even Path..
verses.transliteration: Ith dakhaloo AAala dawoodafafaziAAa minhum qaloo la takhaf khasmanibagha baAAduna AAala baAAdinfahkum baynana bilhaqqi walatushtit wahdina ila sawa-iassirat

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: "This man is my brother: He has nine and ninety ewes, and I have (but) one: Yet he says, 'commit her to my care,' and is (moreover) harsh to me in speech."
verses.transliteration: Inna hatha akhee lahu tisAAunwatisAAoona naAAjatan waliya naAAjatun wahidatun faqalaakfilneeha waAAazzanee fee alkhitab

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
verses.translation: (David) said: "He has undoubtedly wronged thee in demanding thy (single) ewe to be added to his (flock of) ewes: truly many are the partners (in business) who wrong each other: Not so do those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, and how few are they?"... and David gathered that We had tried him: he asked forgiveness of his Lord, fell down, bowing (in prostration), and turned (to Allah in repentance).
verses.transliteration: Qala laqad thalamakabisu-ali naAAjatika ila niAAajihi wa-innakatheeran mina alkhulata-i layabghee baAAduhum AAalabaAAdin illa allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati waqaleelun mahum wathanna dawoodu annama fatannahufastaghfara rabbahu wakharra rakiAAan waanab

verses.arabic: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.translation: So We forgave him this (lapse): he enjoyed, indeed, a Near Approach to Us, and a beautiful place of (Final) Return.
verses.transliteration: Faghafarna lahu thalikawa-inna lahu AAindana lazulfa wahusna maab

verses.arabic: يَـٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ خَلِيفَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: O David! We did indeed make thee a vicegerent on earth: so judge thou between men in truth (and justice): Nor follow thou the lusts (of thy heart), for they will mislead thee from the Path of Allah: for those who wander astray from the Path of Allah, is a Penalty Grievous, for that they forget the Day of Account.
verses.transliteration: Ya dawoodu inna jaAAalnakakhaleefatan fee al-ardi fahkum bayna annasibilhaqqi wala tattabiAAi alhawa fayudillakaAAan sabeeli Allahi inna allatheena yadilloonaAAan sabeeli Allahi lahum AAathabun shadeedun bimanasoo yawma alhisab

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَـٰطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: Not without purpose did We create heaven and earth and all between! that were the thought of Unbelievers! but woe to the Unbelievers because of the Fire (of Hell)!
verses.transliteration: Wama khalaqna assamaawal-arda wama baynahuma batilanthalika thannu allatheena kafaroofawaylun lillatheena kafaroo mina annar

verses.arabic: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ
verses.translation: Shall We treat those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, the same as those who do mischief on earth? Shall We treat those who guard against evil, the same as those who turn aside from the right?
verses.transliteration: Am najAAalu allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati kalmufsideenafee al-ardi am najAAalu almuttaqeena kalfujjar

verses.arabic: كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَـٰرَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.translation: (Here is) a Book which We have sent down unto thee, full of blessings, that they may mediate on its Signs, and that men of understanding may receive admonition.
verses.transliteration: Kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakunliyaddabbaroo ayatihi waliyatathakkara olooal-albab

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: To David We gave Solomon (for a son),- How excellent in Our service! Ever did he turn (to Us)!
verses.transliteration: Wawahabna lidawooda sulaymananiAAma alAAabdu innahu awwab

verses.arabic: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّـٰفِنَـٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ
verses.translation: Behold, there were brought before him, at eventide coursers of the highest breeding, and swift of foot;
verses.transliteration: Ith AAurida AAalayhi bilAAashiyyiassafinatu aljiyad

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ
verses.translation: And he said, "Truly do I love the love of good, with a view to the glory of my Lord,"- until (the sun) was hidden in the veil (of night):
verses.transliteration: Faqala innee ahbabtu hubbaalkhayri AAan thikri rabbee hatta tawaratbilhijab

verses.arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ
verses.translation: "Bring them back to me." then began he to pass his hand over (their) legs and their necks.
verses.transliteration: Ruddooha AAalayya fatafiqa mashanbissooqi wal-aAAnaq

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
verses.translation: And We did try Solomon: We placed on his throne a body (without life); but he did turn (to Us in true devotion):
verses.transliteration: Walaqad fatanna sulaymanawaalqayna AAala kursiyyihi jasadan thumma anab

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
verses.translation: He said, "O my Lord! Forgive me, and grant me a kingdom which, (it may be), suits not another after me: for Thou art the Grantor of Bounties (without measure).
verses.transliteration: Qala rabbi ighfir lee wahab leemulkan la yanbaghee li-ahadin min baAAdee innakaanta alwahhab

verses.arabic: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
verses.translation: Then We subjected the wind to his power, to flow gently to his order, Whithersoever he willed,-
verses.transliteration: Fasakhkharna lahu arreehatajree bi-amrihi rukhaan haythu asab

verses.arabic: وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
verses.translation: As also the evil ones, (including) every kind of builder and diver,-
verses.transliteration: Washshayateena kulla banna-inwaghawwas

verses.arabic: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ
verses.translation: As also others bound together in fetters.
verses.transliteration: Waakhareena muqarraneena fee al-asfad

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.translation: "Such are Our Bounties: whether thou bestow them (on others) or withhold them, no account will be asked."
verses.transliteration: Hatha AAataona famnunaw amsik bighayri hisab

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.translation: And he enjoyed, indeed, a Near Approach to Us, and a beautiful Place of (Final) Return.
verses.transliteration: Wa-inna lahu AAindana lazulfawahusna maab

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
verses.translation: Commemorate Our Servant Job. Behold he cried to his Lord: "The Evil One has afflicted me with distress and suffering!"
verses.transliteration: Wathkur AAabdanaayyooba ith nada rabbahu annee massaniya ashshaytanubinusbin waAAathab

verses.arabic: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
verses.translation: (The command was given:) "Strike with thy foot: here is (water) wherein to wash, cool and refreshing, and (water) to drink."
verses.transliteration: Orkud birijlika hathamughtasalun baridun washarab

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.translation: And We gave him (back) his people, and doubled their number,- as a Grace from Ourselves, and a thing for commemoration, for all who have Understanding.
verses.transliteration: Wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamithlahummaAAahum rahmatan minna wathikrali-olee al-albab

verses.arabic: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَـٰهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: "And take in thy hand a little grass, and strike therewith: and break not (thy oath)." Truly We found him full of patience and constancy. How excellent in Our service! ever did he turn (to Us)!
verses.transliteration: Wakhuth biyadika dighthan fadribbihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiranniAAma alAAabdu innahu awwab

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَـٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
verses.translation: And commemorate Our Servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, possessors of Power and Vision.
verses.transliteration: Wathkur AAibadanaibraheema wa-ishaqa wayaAAqooba olee al-aydee wal-absar

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ
verses.translation: Verily We did choose them for a special (purpose)- proclaiming the Message of the Hereafter.
verses.transliteration: Inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatinthikra addar

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: They were, in Our sight, truly, of the company of the Elect and the Good.
verses.transliteration: Wa-innahum AAindana lamina almustafaynaal-akhyar

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: And commemorate Isma'il, Elisha, and Zul-Kifl: Each of them was of the Company of the Good.
verses.transliteration: Wathkur ismaAAeelawa-ilyasaAAa watha alkifli wakullun mina al-akhyar

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.translation: This is a Message (of admonition): and verily, for the righteous, is a beautiful Place of (Final) Return,-
verses.transliteration: Hatha thikrun wa-innalilmuttaqeena lahusna maab

verses.arabic: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ
verses.translation: Gardens of Eternity, whose doors will (ever) be open to them;
verses.transliteration: Jannati AAadnin mufattahatanlahumu al-abwab

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
verses.translation: Therein will they recline (at ease): Therein can they call (at pleasure) for fruit in abundance, and (delicious) drink;
verses.transliteration: Muttaki-eena feeha yadAAoona feehabifakihatin katheeratin washarab

verses.arabic: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
verses.translation: And beside them will be chaste women restraining their glances, (companions) of equal age.
verses.transliteration: WaAAindahum qasiratu attarfiatrab

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: Such is the Promise made, to you for the Day of Account!
verses.transliteration: Hatha ma tooAAadoona liyawmialhisab

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
verses.translation: Truly such will be Our Bounty (to you); it will never fail;-
verses.transliteration: Inna hatha larizquna malahu min nafad

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّـٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.translation: Yea, such! but - for the wrong-doers will be an evil place of (Final) Return!-
verses.transliteration: Hatha wa-inna littagheenalasharra maab

verses.arabic: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
verses.translation: Hell!- they will burn therein, - an evil bed (indeed, to lie on)!-
verses.transliteration: Jahannama yaslawnaha fabi/saalmihad

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
verses.translation: Yea, such! - then shall they taste it,- a boiling fluid, and a fluid dark, murky, intensely cold!-
verses.transliteration: Hatha falyathooqoohu hameemunwaghassaq

verses.arabic: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ
verses.translation: And other Penalties of a similar kind, to match them!
verses.transliteration: Waakharu min shaklihi azwaj

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: Here is a troop rushing headlong with you! No welcome for them! truly, they shall burn in the Fire!
verses.transliteration: Hatha fawjun muqtahimunmaAAakum la marhaban bihim innahum saloo annar

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ
verses.translation: (The followers shall cry to the misleaders:) "Nay, ye (too)! No welcome for you! It is ye who have brought this upon us! Now evil is (this) place to stay in!"
verses.transliteration: Qaloo bal antum la marhabanbikum antum qaddamtumoohu lana fabi/sa alqarar

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: They will say: "Our Lord! whoever brought this upon us,- Add to him a double Penalty in the Fire!"
verses.transliteration: Qaloo rabbana man qaddama lanahatha fazidhu AAathaban diAAfan fee annar

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ
verses.translation: And they will say: "What has happened to us that we see not men whom we used to number among the bad ones?
verses.transliteration: Waqaloo ma lana lanara rijalan kunna naAAudduhum mina al-ashrar

verses.arabic: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ
verses.translation: "Did we treat them (as such) in ridicule, or have (our) eyes failed to perceive them?"
verses.transliteration: Attakhathnahum sikhriyyan am zaghatAAanhumu al-absar

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: Truly that is just and fitting,- the mutual recriminations of the People of the Fire!
verses.transliteration: Inna thalika lahaqqun takhasumuahli annar

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: Say: "Truly am I a Warner: no god is there but the one Allah, Supreme and Irresistible,-
verses.transliteration: Qul innama ana munthirunwama min ilahin illa Allahu alwahidualqahhar

verses.arabic: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
verses.translation: "The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all between,- Exalted in Might, able to enforce His Will, forgiving again and again."
verses.transliteration: Rabbu assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma alAAazeezu alghaffar

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say: "That is a Message Supreme (above all),-
verses.transliteration: Qul huwa nabaon AAatheem

verses.arabic: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: "From which ye do turn away!
verses.transliteration: Antum AAanhu muAAridoon

verses.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: "No knowledge have I of the Chiefs on high, when they discuss (matters) among themselves.
verses.transliteration: Ma kana liya min AAilmin bilmala-ial-aAAla ith yakhtasimoon

verses.arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: 'Only this has been revealed to me: that I am to give warning plainly and publicly."
verses.transliteration: In yooha ilayya illa annamaana natheerun mubeen

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: Behold, thy Lord said to the angels: "I am about to create man from clay:
verses.transliteration: Ith qala rabbuka lilmala-ikatiinnee khaliqun basharan min teen

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ
verses.translation: "When I have fashioned him (in due proportion) and breathed into him of My spirit, fall ye down in obeisance unto him."
verses.transliteration: Fa-itha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehimin roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideen

verses.arabic: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.translation: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together:
verses.transliteration: Fasajada almala-ikatu kulluhumajmaAAoon

verses.arabic: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: Not so Iblis: he was haughty, and became one of those who reject Faith.
verses.transliteration: Illa ibleesa istakbara wakanamina alkafireen

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ
verses.translation: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! What prevents thee from prostrating thyself to one whom I have created with my hands? Art thou haughty? Or art thou one of the high (and mighty) ones?"
verses.transliteration: Qala ya ibleesu mamanaAAaka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta amkunta mina alAAaleen

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍ
verses.translation: (Iblis) said: "I am better than he: thou createdst me from fire, and him thou createdst from clay."
verses.transliteration: Qala ana khayrun minhukhalaqtanee min narin wakhalaqtahu min teen

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
verses.translation: (Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here: for thou art rejected, accursed.
verses.transliteration: Qala fakhruj minhafa-innaka rajeem

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: "And My curse shall be on thee till the Day of Judgment."
verses.transliteration: Wa-inna AAalayka laAAnatee ila yawmiaddeen

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: (Iblis) said: "O my Lord! Give me then respite till the Day the (dead) are raised."
verses.transliteration: Qala rabbi faanthirneeila yawmi yubAAathoon

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
verses.translation: (Allah) said: "Respite then is granted thee-
verses.transliteration: Qala fa-innaka mina almunthareen

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
verses.translation: "Till the Day of the Time Appointed."
verses.transliteration: Ila yawmi alwaqti almaAAloom

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: (Iblis) said: "Then, by Thy power, I will put them all in the wrong,-
verses.transliteration: Qala fabiAAizzatika laoghwiyannahumajmaAAeen

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: "Except Thy Servants amongst them, sincere and purified (by Thy Grace)."
verses.transliteration: Illa AAibadaka minhumualmukhlaseen

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
verses.translation: (Allah) said: "Then it is just and fitting- and I say what is just and fitting-
verses.transliteration: Qala falhaqqu walhaqqaaqool

verses.arabic: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: "That I will certainly fill Hell with thee and those that follow thee,- every one."
verses.transliteration: Laamlaanna jahannama minka wamimmantabiAAaka minhum ajmaAAeen

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Say: "No reward do I ask of you for this (Qur'an), nor am I a pretender.
verses.transliteration: Qul ma as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrinwama ana mina almutakallifeen

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: "This is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds.
verses.transliteration: In huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameen

verses.arabic: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ
verses.translation: "And ye shall certainly know the truth of it (all) after a while."
verses.transliteration: WalataAAlamunna nabaahu baAAda heen
